statements: UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET check_in_time = '08:00:00', working_hours = 8 WHERE employee_id = 1 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET check_out_time = '17:00:00', working_hours = 8 WHERE date = '2022-01-16' AND employee_id = 2;
UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET check_in_time = '08:30:00', check_out_time = '17:00:00', working_hours = 8 WHERE employee_id = 101 AND date = '2022-05-10';
UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET working_hours = 6, check_in_time = '09:00:00', check_out_time = '15:00:00' WHERE date = '2022-05-12' AND employee_id = 102;
UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET check_in_time = '09:00:00', check_out_time = '17:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 123 AND date = '2021-10-01';
UPDATE EmployeeWorkingHours SET total_working_hours = 160.50 WHERE employee_id = 456 AND month_year = '2021-09';
UPDATE EmployeeAttendance SET check_out_time = '18:00:00' WHERE employee_id = 123 AND date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE EmployeeWorkingHours SET total_working_hours = 160.50 WHERE employee_id = 456 AND month_year = 'September 2022';
UPDATE Employees SET department = 'IT' WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE WorkingHours SET hours_worked = 8.5 WHERE employee_id = 201 AND work_date = '2022-03-10';
UPDATE Employees SET department = 'IT', hire_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE employee_id = 12345;
UPDATE Attendance SET check_out_time = NOW() WHERE employee_id = 54321 AND attendance_id = 1001;
UPDATE employee SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', department = 'Marketing' WHERE employee_id = 1;
UPDATE working_hours SET hours_worked = 8.5, date = '2023-05-15' WHERE employee_id = 2;
UPDATE employee SET department='IT', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE employee_id=1;
UPDATE attendance SET check_in='2022-10-15 09:00:00', check_out='2022-10-15 17:00:00' WHERE attendance_id=3;
UPDATE employees SET name='Alice', role='Manager' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE employees SET department='Engineering', name='Bob' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE employees SET department='Sales', role='Manager' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE employees SET role='Developer', department='Engineering' WHERE name='John Doe';
